title: Milwaukee Burger
address: Multiple locations: Manuela Malasaña 9, Infantas 29, América 33, Narváez 26
knownFor: Authentic Wisconsin butterburgers, 1950s American diner style
description: Authentic Wisconsin butterburger chain with luncheonette-style counters. Themed locations include 1950s pharmacy (Milwaukee Drugs), bowling alley decor, and classic diners. Motto: 'Just burgers, beers and a lot of butter.' Also serves milkshakes and butterfries.
